text: Rafael Nadal was the defending champion and he successfully defended his title by defeating Daniil Medvedev 6–3, 6–0 in the final. This was the first time Nadal defended a hard-court title. ==Seeds== The top eight seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Lucky loser=== # John Millman ===Qualifying draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ====Fifth qualifier==== ====Sixth qualifier==== ====Seventh qualifier==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Men's Singles Rogers Cup – Singles
title: 2019 Rogers Cup – Men's Singles
